#summary Please read first

= Welcome =

  * Help Center
    * For help on using My Tracks, see http://support.google.com/gmm/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=2391538&topic=2391064&ctx=topic
    * If you feel an answer is missing or needs to be updated, please file a bug to update the help center.
  * User Forum
    * For My Tracks discussion, use https://productforums.google.com/forum/#!categories/maps/mytracks
  * Bug/Feature Request
     * Use http://code.google.com/p/mytracks/issues/list
     * Before doing so, search through the existing issues to avoid duplication.
  * Programmers contributing to My Tracks
     * Start with DevelopmentProcess
     * Use mytracks-dev@googlegroups.com discussion group
     * Before doing any work, email the discussion group to let us know which feature you would like to work on. If you like to help with the next release, we also have a list of tasks that need to be completed. Just email the discussion group.

Sincerely, 
the My Tracks team
